articles.title: Oil prices at seven-month low but OMCs keep petrol, diesel prices unchanged - The Economic Times
articles.description: International benchmark Brent crude fell below USD 90 per barrel last week for the first time since early February as recession fears weigh on demand. It has since recovered and is trading at USD 92.84 per barrel, the lowest in six months.
